product_name: Easton Mountain Products Hike Carbon Cork 3 Trekking Poles - Pair
long_description: The Easton Mountain Products Ultralight Carbon Cork 3 Trekking Poles boast carbon construction that delivers the ultimate minimalist pole so you can go farther, faster. Super-light construction with multi-directional layering maximizes strength. Powerful and lightweight non-slip twist lock system. Premium cork grips; easy-adjust performance wrist strap. The Easton Mountain Products Ultralight Carbon Cork 3 Trekking Poles feature ultralight integrated trail baskets and carbide tips.
short_description: The Easton Mountain Products Ultralight Carbon Cork 3 Trekking Poles boast carbon construction that delivers the ultimate minimalist pole so you can go farther, faster.
